name: xyOps Network
description: Network diagnostic and analysis tools for xyOps workflows
author: xyOps

tools.title: IP Address Tools
tools.description: Validate, convert, and analyze IP addresses.

fields.title: Mode
fields.value: Validate & Analyze [validate], IP to Decimal [toDecimal], Decimal to IP [fromDecimal], IP to Binary [toBinary], Subnet Calculator [subnet]
fields.caption: Select the operation to perform.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the IP.

fields.title: IP Address / Value
fields.caption: IP address or decimal value. For subnet mode, use CIDR (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24).

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

tools.title: JWT Decoder
tools.description: Decode and inspect JWT tokens (header, payload, expiration).

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the JWT.

fields.title: JWT Token
fields.caption: JWT token to decode.

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to the data field. (Used when Data Source is 'input data')

tools.title: Ping Test
tools.description: Ping a host and measure latency with statistics.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the host.

fields.title: Host
fields.caption: Hostname or IP address to ping.

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').

fields.title: Ping Count
fields.caption: Number of pings to send (1-10).

fields.title: Timeout (ms)
fields.caption: Timeout per ping in milliseconds (100-30000).

tools.title: DNS Lookup
tools.description: Resolve DNS records including A, AAAA, MX, TXT, CNAME, NS, SOA, and PTR (reverse).

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the query.

fields.title: Domain / IP
fields.caption: Domain name or IP address (for PTR/reverse lookup).

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').

fields.title: Record Type
fields.value: A Record (IPv4) [A], AAAA Record (IPv6) [AAAA], MX Record (Mail) [MX], TXT Record [TXT], CNAME Record [CNAME], NS Record (Name Server) [NS], SOA Record [SOA], PTR Record (Reverse DNS) [PTR]
fields.caption: Type of DNS record to query.

fields.title: DNS Server (optional)
fields.caption: Custom DNS server (e.g., 8.8.8.8, 1.1.1.1). Leave empty for system DNS.

tools.title: Traceroute
tools.description: Trace the network path to a host, showing each hop.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the host.

fields.title: Host
fields.caption: Hostname or IP address to trace.

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').

fields.title: Max Hops
fields.caption: Maximum number of hops (1-64).

fields.title: Timeout (ms)
fields.caption: Timeout per hop in milliseconds.

fields.title: Resolve Hostnames
fields.caption: Resolve IP addresses to hostnames.

tools.title: Port Scanner
tools.description: Check if specific ports are open on a host.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the host.

fields.title: Host
fields.caption: Hostname or IP address to scan.

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').

fields.title: Ports
fields.caption: Comma-separated ports or ranges (e.g., 80,443,8080-8090). Max 100 ports.

fields.title: Timeout (ms)
fields.caption: Connection timeout per port in milliseconds.

tools.title: HTTP Status Checker
tools.description: Check HTTP status, response time, and headers for a URL.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the URL.

fields.title: URL
fields.caption: URL to check (https:// added if not specified).

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').

fields.title: HTTP Method
fields.caption: HTTP method to use.

fields.title: Timeout (seconds)
fields.caption: Request timeout in seconds (1-60).

fields.title: Follow Redirects
fields.caption: Automatically follow HTTP redirects.

tools.title: SSL Certificate Checker
tools.description: Check SSL/TLS certificate details, expiry, and validity.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the host.

fields.title: Host
fields.caption: Hostname or URL (port 443 default, or specify host:port).

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').

tools.title: WHOIS Lookup
tools.description: Look up domain registration information via WHOIS.

fields.title: Data Source
fields.value: Use text field below [field], Use job input data [input]
fields.caption: Choose where to get the domain.

fields.title: Domain
fields.caption: Domain name to look up (e.g., example.com).

fields.title: Input Data Path
fields.caption: Dot-notation path to data field (when source is 'input').
